name: Untowered Hearts
description:
Tower Defense made by Team 3 for GameBox (February-March 2022).

A dramatic story about the failed love of a powerful witch and a brilliant engineer, which you will immerse yourself in as you progress through the seven levels of our game.

-  Interaction system of towers and monsters colors pushes the player to carefully think through his strategy

- Improving the capabilities of towers after successfully completed levels

- Two special player abilities that allow you to respond to the challenges provided by the game

Team:

  • Mikhail Benkov - Unity Developer
  • Ilya Ulybyshev - Game Designer
  • Alexander Rubtsov - Game Designer
  • George Perminov - Sound Designer
  • Chernakova Inna - 2D Artist
  • Shelmanov Pavel - 3D Artist

Asset used: https://quaternius.com/packs/ultimatenature.html
